auth_email_in_use: This email address is already in use.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_change_passwor: You must be logged in to change your password.
auth_must_be_logged_in_to_update: You must be logged in to update your profile.
auth_password_requirements: Password must be at least 8 characters long and contain an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number, and a symbol.
bio_placeholder: Tell us a little about yourself and your kitchen...
change_password_desc: For your security, use a strong password that you haven't used elsewhere.
chef_is_busy_desc: The chef is busy preparing other orders. You can confirm your order, and it will be placed in a queue.
chef_is_currently_closed_desc: This chef is not accepting new orders at this time. Please check back later.
chef_login_desc: Enter your credentials to manage your orders and menu.
chef_signup_desc: Join our platform and share your culinary talent.
community_chat_desc: Connect with fellow food lovers and share your experiences.
coupon_code_min_length: Coupon code must be at least 3 characters.
coupon_limit_reached_error: This coupon has reached its usage limit.
coupon_management_desc: Create and manage discount coupons to attract more customers.
coupon_not_applicable_error: This coupon is not applicable to this dish.
customer_login_desc: Enter your email and password to access your account.
customer_signup_desc: Create an account to browse chefs and order delicious meals.
delete_dish_warning: This will permanently delete '{{name}}'. This action cannot be undone.
delivery_information_desc: Confirm your address to receive your order.
discover_best_chefs_desc: Enjoy authentic homemade meals, prepared with love and passion just for you.
dish_added_toast_desc: '{{name}}' has been successfully added to your menu.
end_date_after_start_date: End date must be after the start date.
failed_to_send_message: Failed to send message. Please try again.
feature_unavailable_desc_localstorage: This feature is not available in local storage mode. It will be enabled when connected to a live database.
forgot_password_desc_initial: Don't worry, it happens. Enter your email to reset your password.
forgot_password_desc_sent: If your email is in our system, you will receive a password reset link shortly.
login_required_desc: Please login or create a new account to proceed.
logout_desc: This will log you out of your account on this device.
menu_management_desc: Add, edit, and manage the dishes you offer to customers.
must_be_chef: You must be a chef to perform this action.
must_be_customer_to_chat: You must be a registered customer to access the chat.
name: Name
new_order_notification_desc: You have a new order for '{{dishName}}' from {{customerName}}.
new_waitlisted_order_notification_desc: You have a new waitlisted order from {{customerName}}.
no_chefs_available: There are no chefs available at the moment.
no_chefs_match_search: No chefs found matching your search.
no_coupons: You don't have any coupons yet
no_coupons_desc: Get started by creating a new coupon to attract customers!
no_dishes_to_add: You don't have any dishes to select.
no_links_allowed: Sharing links is not allowed in the chat.
no_messages_yet: No messages yet. Be the first to start the conversation!
no_new_orders: No new orders at the moment.
no_orders_yet: You haven't placed any orders yet.
no_orders_yet_desc: Your order list is looking empty. Start browsing for dishes!
no_reviews_for_dish: No reviews for this dish yet.
order_confirmed_notification_desc: Your order for '{{dishName}}' has been confirmed and is now being prepared!
order_delivered_notification_desc: Your order for '{{dishName}}' has been delivered. Enjoy your meal!
order_error_desc: You must be logged in and have a valid delivery address to confirm the order.
order_on_the_way_notification_desc: Your order for '{{dishName}}' is on its way to you now!
order_ready_notification_desc: Your order for '{{dishName}}' is ready and waiting for the delivery person.
order_rejected_notification_desc: Unfortunately, your order for '{{dishName}}' has been rejected.
order_sent_toast_review_desc: Your order for {{quantity}}x '{{dishName}}' has been sent to the chef for review.
order_sent_toast_waitlisted_desc: The chef is busy, your order has been waitlisted.
order_waitlisted_notification_desc: Your order for '{{dishName}}' has been waitlisted as the chef is busy. You'll be notified when it's accepted.
password_change_failed_toast_desc: Something went wrong. Please try again.
password_changed_toast_desc: Your password has been updated successfully.
password_db_desc: This page displays all registered users. (For demonstration purposes only)
pending_orders_desc: You have {{count}} pending orders in your queue. Check them out now!
prep_time_positive: Prep time must be a positive number.
price_positive: Price must be a positive number.
profile_updated_desc: Your personal information has been saved.
rate_order_placeholder: Tell us what you thought of the meal...
review_submitted_toast_desc: We appreciate your feedback, it helps us improve.
search_placeholder: Search for a chef or a specialty...
select_one_dish_for_specific: You must select at least one dish when applying to specific dishes.
something_went_wrong: Something went wrong. Please try again.
specific_dishes_desc: Select the dishes this coupon applies to.
this_chef_has_no_dishes: This chef hasn't added any dishes to their menu yet.
track_your_current_orders: Track your orders that are still in progress.
update_error_desc: We couldn't save your changes. Please try again.
usage_limit_min: Usage limit must be at least 1.
validation_email_must_start_with_letter: Email must start with a letter.
your_menu_is_empty_desc: Start by adding your delicious dishes to attract customers.
